title: ULTIMATE LUX BUG!! | FREELO IN RANKED - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: After watching redmercy video about the lux bug someone told him about. i decided to see if in fact you could abuse it and get free wins from it but baiting your opponent in 1 direction or confusing them so they have to flash because they dont know which one is which.

body: let me know what you think of the video! massive lux glitch where you can shoot more than 1 ult.
